casebody.data:
BOWLER v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND PENITENTIARY [App. No. 1,

September Term, 1962 (Adv.).]

Decided May 18, 1962.

Before Bruñe, C. J., and HammondJ Prescott, Horney, Marbury and SybERT, JJ.

*663Per Curiam.

For the reasons stated by Judge Harlan for dismissing the petition, the application for leave to appeal is denied.

Application denied.
